nodes.text: This Mandalorian child studied at the Sundari Mandalorian school in the Mandalorian capital city of Sundari.

After an unknown plague hit the city, duchess Satine Kryze and senator Padmé Amidala visited the Sundari school, hoping to discover the source of the outbreak. Once there, they were met by doctor Zak Zaz who, listening to Satine's concerns, took this child's beverage tea to see if it tested positive for any kind of contaminant.
